text: Kephalai is a plane , characterized by bustling cities with gothic architecture, surrounded by large bodies of water. Kephalai has a totalitarian and bureaucratic government. The capital is Aretopolis , which was once visited by Chandra Nalaar . Kephalai is known for its bazaar where items from other planes can be found, such as the Dragon Scroll and the Book of Kith and Kin from Lorwyn . Aretopolis . The Sanctum of Stars - accidentally destroyed by Chandra.
